title: Chicken Stuffed with Spinach, Cream & Mustard Mixture
directions: Cut the Chicken breasts in half so that you have 4 pieces.
Cut across the top of the chicken breast, once vertically and twice horizontally, so it's like a grid. (Depending on the size of the breast, you might have to do only one horizontal cut.)
In a small bowl, mix together the Cream, Spinach, Mustard and Grated Cheese.
Scoop a portion of the mixture into the incision on the chicken, making sure it is filled out completely.
Sprinkle the breadcrumbs over the chicken breasts.
Place in the oven for 45 Minutes / 1 Hour or until it begins to brown.
Serve on a bed of rice or vegetables.
ingredients: 1 Tbs of Grated Cheese (Cheddar; Edam; Mozzarella)
